Perceptor::

"What strange..." said Perceptor "Chamaleon is pretty nice and calmed 
down... he could be a bit hysterical but not a mean-bot... Do you 
have anything else to say, Bullet? "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> for the first time Bullet had to think like a Predacon instead of 
just being a soldier. "Blaze and I asked him a few questions and he 
wouldn't get us the answers. We tried to ask him nicely but he 
wouldn't respond to  our kindness." For Bullet grabbing a bot by the 
throat was being nice, otherwise the puny bot wouldn't have legs to 
run away.
> 
> 
> Perceptor:
> 
> "How did Chameleon ticked you off, Bullet?" asked Perceptor
